meanings.definition: A medical instrument used to examine the urethra.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a small urethroscope to look inside the urethra.
meanings.sent2: The urethroscope helped the urologist see any issues in the urethra clearly.
meanings.sent3: When the nurse misplaced the urethroscope, it led to a comical search around the clinic.
meanings.sent4: The urethroscope was like a tiny detective investigating the mysteries of the urethra.
meanings.sent5: With the urethroscope, the doctor could explore the urethra like an explorer in a cave.

meanings.definition: To examine the urethra using a urethroscope.
meanings.sent1: The urologist will urethroscope the patient to check for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: She urethroscopes carefully to ensure a thorough examination of the urethra.
meanings.sent3: The medical student nervously urethroscopes for the first time during training.
